page.title: 14Warley Water Tower (9)
page.content: On{Harborne Rd}there is a{water tower and a{reservoir.}The reservoir supplies{50,000 people in B'ham}with drinking water. It belongs to the Severn-Trent Water Authority. The water tower however belongs to the S.Staffordshire Water Co. It is used as a backup if water in S.Staffs, or in emergency B'ham,runs low. The reservoir needs to hold a lot of water if it is to supply 50,000 people with water a day,{1.25 million gallons in fact. This large amount of water is needed because{each person uses 24 {gallons a day.}That is used mainly in W.C. flushing, laundering, drinking, cooking, cleaning and other domestic activities.
